Lecture nodes

Author and co-author of many lecture notes about software design, design patterns, logic, functional and object-oriented programming, and declarative programming. The lecture notes, in spanish, are on-line in the following sites: • http://uqbar-wiki.org/ • http://www.pdep.com.ar
